name: Nova Coin
description: Nova Coin (NVC) is a next-generation digital currency designed to power community-driven economies. Built on Solana, NVC focuses on speed, scalability, and real-world adoption. It fuels decentralized payments, powers incentive systems, and supports innovative financial applications. Nova Coin is not just a token — it’s a bridge between digital innovation and everyday utility, enabling frictionless transactions for individuals, startups, and global enterprises.
